values: I haven't posted in awhile, been very busy with school.  Plus I have  never been much of a blogger, I'm more of a lurker.  I have been really into the Harry Potter crossover stories and Star Trek 2009 fanfiction, but lately I have been reading through some of my old Snarry fanfictions favorites and rediscovering why I fell in love with Snarry in the first place!

Prince Expectant by h_Whortleberry

This story can be found here:
http://h-whortleberry.livejournal.com/623.html

I loved this story!  It was soooooo hot, when I was reading it I was chanting "Orgy, Orgy" in my head!  The beginning was hot and ranchy, but it was only the beginning of a very well written and entertaining story.  This is a mpreg, one of the only mpreg stories were I preferred Snape as the pregnant one.  The story was a romantic comedy, but you have some nice angst mixed in.  There are some parts you laugh out loud to and some that your heart clinches in sympathy.  This is one of those stories that you read and don't want it to end, I definitely consider it on my top 10 Snarrys.

A  Fool to Late by Atrata - Harry goes to rescue Professor Lupin, but it doesn't go quite the way he'd planned. Written for the May 2005 Pornish Pixies Fantasy Fest for bicyclette. Warnings for chan, large object penetration and double-penetration.  Warning:  Ambiguous Consent, Chan: adult / teen, Sex

This story can be found here:
http://www.the-archive.net/viewstory.php?sid=2094

This story was so hot and pure threesome smut, I loved it!

A Change of Circumstance by iulia_linnea - Steps must be taken to insure that Harry is no longer a fit vessel for the Dark Lord.

This story can be found here:
http://iulia-linnea.insanejournal.com/220604.html

A very interesting story, Harry get changed into a girl and Snape need to deflower her so that Voldie cannot us her as a breeding tool.  An original plot, well written, and hot sex, what else can you as for?  Though I do wish that iulia_linnea would write a sequel, I think there is more story to tell.

500 Friends Ficlets by iulia-linnea, this is the story 3.  Soup's on

This story can be found at:
http://iulia-linnea.insanejournal.com/231469.html

A very short humors story, contains Gender bending.

Room 300 by Rakina -  Severus Snape was never the type of man to take a holiday. But now Voldemort's just ancient history and Hogwarts has settled back to something like normality, he thinks he might quite like a relaxing summer break in a quiet hotel in Spain.  Warnings:  Sexual Situations, Contains Slash Sex

This story can be found here:
http://www.hpfandom.net/eff/viewstory.php?sid=17309

A funny story about Snape taking a holiday, but is disturbed by one of the other hotel visitors being a little too loud when he is enjoying himself...I wonder who it is??  I wouldn't say that this story is deep or anything, but it is funny and cute, something to read when you just need a little smut.

Chocolate by Eriador117 - Harry/Snape summary: follows on from Games without Frontiers and His Master's Voice Harry is upset by their games, Severus wonders if they've gone too far. Hurt/comfort, a little sappy probably. It was going to be more smutty than this, but Harry wasn't in the mood :-) warnings: angst, mention of child abuse, D/s, teacher/student. Disclaimer: The Potterverse belongs to JK Rowling, I just play in it from time to time. 

This story can be found here:
http://hpfandom.net/eff/viewstory.php?sid=7421

Games Without Frontiers by Eriador117 - Harry finds comfort in the most unexpected place... warnings: D/s, teacher/student, spanking

This story can be found here:
http://hpfandom.net/eff/viewstory.php?sid=5202

His Master's Voice by Eriador117 - Harry loves his Master's voice .... sequel to Games Without Frontiers warnings: blindfolds and light bondage, teacher/student 

This story can be found here:
http://hpfandom.net/eff/viewuser.php?uid=898

These stories are very hot, they delve into D/s, with Snape being the Dom and Harry the sub.  I hope she will write more in this series.

No Way Back by Meri - At the end of fifth year, Harry falls into a mirror and is forever changed by the experience.

This story can be found here:
http://www.walkingtheplank.org/archive/viewuser.php?uid=163

This has to be my favorite of Meri's stories so far.  The plot was creative and the characters deep and lovable, even Draco.

Outside the Lines by Meri - Snape is willing to do anything to be free of the Dark Lord.


This story can be found here:
http://www.walkingtheplank.org/archive/viewuser.php?uid=163

Harry finds a way to get control of all his powers, Snape has to sleep with him, but the problem is Snape is straight.  A very creative storyline, nice relationship progress.  I love what Meri does toward the end after Voldie's defeat.  She goes into what the characters are going to do when the wars is over and how Harry helps the Wizarding World with a power hungry Ministry of Magic.

Courtship Rituals by Meri - Snape is ordered to court Harry Potter.

This story can be found here:
http://www.walkingtheplank.org/archive/viewuser.php?uid=163

This is the first story I've read that Voldie wants Snape to have a relationship with Harry, most of the time they have to hide their involvement.  The relationship progress was very well done, but I thought that the ending seemed kind of rushed.  Meri takes her time with the rest of the story, but it seems when she got to the end she just wanted it to be done.

Jerusalem by Meri - Harry helps Severus with a problem and realizes a few things along the way.


This story can be found here:
http://www.walkingtheplank.org/archive/viewuser.php?uid=163

This is a nice little romantic story.  It is post war, Harry and Snape have lunch together once every week and Harry's friends think that there is more to their relationship than friendship.  Harry is so clueless that it is cute.  This story isn't by favorite of Meri, but all her stuff is golden.

A Time for All Things by Meri - There is a time for all things, but sometimes you have to wait for them.

This story can be found at:
http://www.walkingtheplank.org/archive/viewuser.php?uid=163

I really enjoyed this story.  It was a story that showed a nice and slow progress of Harry's and Snape's relationship where Snape makes Harry go a live life before they can start dating.  The author knows when to expand on a scene and when to skim over a scene.

I Scream, You Scream by Jadzialove - Eating ice cream had never been so complicated...or rewarding.  Warning:  Rimming

You can find this story here:
http://www.walkingtheplank.org/archive/viewuser.php?uid=205

A very sexy story, I loved the ice cream play.  It was also very cute that Snape would Polyjuice so that he could enjoy his guilt pleasure, ice cream.

Convenience by Moth Malaise - When Snape's mother dies, an unexpected clause in her will requires him to get married or forget about inheriting Prince Manor. He despairs - until a highly convenient possibility arises. HBP compliant, but not DH. Anal,COMPLETE,M/M,SoloM


This story can be found here:
http://hp.adultfanfiction.net/story.php?no=600011852

This is a cute little story.  Snape needs to get married, Harry needs to fix his "problem".  The Solution, they help each other.  The Problem, Harry doesn't realize that Snape's solution is permanent.  Very entertaining and well written.

The Devil Will Drag You Under by Dementor Delta - AU-Chan. Harry must marry Snape for his own protection. Only a legality for seven years, of course.  Warning:  Chan 11-12

The story can be found here:
http://www.walkingtheplank.org/archive/viewuser.php?action=storiesby&uid=236&offset=0

You can always trust DementorDelta to write something fun and kinky!  This story, while not one of my favorite, was still very fun to read.  The idea of Snape picking up Harry from his relatives before his first year is not the most orginal idea, but this is story does that theme much more justice than any other story I've read.  I also love that Harry and Snape get along from the very beginning, it makes the story a fun and relaxing read.  The sex is hot, I love that harry is the aggressor, Snape is so seduced!

Protean Charm by Elanor - [SS/HP slash] While spending a summer alone at Grimmauld Place, training for a war over which he has no control, Harry begins to question whom he can really trust.

Here is the link:
http://archive.skyehawke.com/story.php?no=8401&PHPSESSID=1552825bfff0b402415eefff6c779cca

I loved this story, it was very enjoyable.  It was well written and the sex was HOT.  I'm not a huge fan of bottom Snape, but there is something about Snape being a slutty cock whore that is so sexy!

Primer to the Dark Arts by Icarus, Harry learns he is to be given private (and secret) tutoring in the Dark Arts to protect himself next time he meets Voldemort. His teacher? Professor Snape. Features ghost cats and cursed harps, spells that are supposed to go wrong and don't, a friendly sociopathic Death Eater... and Snape's very naughty, naughty library.

Cursed Artefacts For Sale by Icarus, Severus drags Harry to a Wizarding auction. "Collecting Cursed Artefacts is a registered form of madness in the Compendium of Wizarding Mental Disorders and Other Things That Make You Twitch," Severus said, "like most compulsions to collect. But it's very a popular one and I plan to beat everyone else to it." Part of the Primer to the Dark Arts universe.

Drunken Domesticity by Icarus, Post-Hogwarts Ron has a midnight visitor - when will Harry learn to call ahead? This, my friends, is a friend. Features Ron's observations on the Ministry, Harry's sex life and the infamous WUC. Written for the Boozefest http://boozefest.netfirms.com.

Rare Scottish Snow by Icarus, Harry insists Severus experience a bit of the great outdoors. One way or another. (Primer to the Dark Arts universe.) Some extra snark for Bluemoon. Very brief.

These stories can be found here:
http://www.icarus.slashcity.net/stories/primer_onefile.html
http://www.icarus.slashcity.net/stories/cursedartefacts.html
http://www.icarus.slashcity.net/stories/drunken01.html
http://www.icarus.slashcity.net/stories/rarescottish.html
At NC-17 version of Primer to the Dark Arts can be found here:
http://www.restrictedsection.org/



I loved these stories!  Primer to the Dark Arts was a great story.  It did start off as a Ron/Harry, but it evolves into a Snarry story.  I thought this story presented a realistic situation were Harry and Snape goet together.  It started off with releasing of Sexual tension and mutual attraction and slowly built into a relationship based on love.  I loved Icarus's Snape, he was just so passionate/obsessive about the Dark Arts, totally possessive of Harry, and jealous of Harry's past and current relationship with Ron.  Icarus creates a Snape that is probably not completely sane, but you love him anyways!  There was one part were Snape corners Harry in the Dark Forest and he is jealous that Harry and Ron seem so close.  Snape is circling Harry and practically snarling at him. Harry compares Snape to a dangerous creature from his Care for Magical Creatures and treats the situation accordingly, totally priceless!

Cursed Artefacts For Sale, Drunken Domesticity, and Rare Scottish Snow are side fics to Primer to the Dark Arts.  Cursed Artefacts for Sale was hilarious!  This story really shows Snapes eccentric behavior, he actually collects Cursed Items!  Snape even gets Harry 4 hours early for the auction so they can get there before everybody get the good stuff!  I loved the part were Snape thinks that Narcista only buys cursed items that he wants, and Harry sees her go back to a table they just left and buy the item that Snape was looking at just minutes before!  Little things like that have be falling off my seat with laughter!  

Drunken Domesticity was a much more serious story.  It is about Ron having to deal with the aftermath of one of Snape's and Harry's fights.  I loved the ending were Snape and Ron come to an understanding about Snape's relationship with Harry.  It ties up some loose ends in Primer to the Dark Arts and Cursed Artefacts for Sale.  Rare Scottish Snow is just a really sweet story that results in a playful snowball fight, very cute! 

I loved the writing style in these stories, it made it very easy to follow what is happening.  The characters dialog and interaction with each other was great.  The banter was so entertaining!  I hope that Icarus will write a sequel to Primer to the Dark Arts because it just didn't feel like the story is over.  There still seems to be more to tell.  Plus Snape's and Harry's relationship is still in the baby stage, there is still so much more growing up and evolving to write about!  I want to read more!

Contemporary Magical Innovations, by H. Granger by kai, The difference between History and What Really Happened.  Warning:  None

This story plus others written by kai can be found here:
http://www.walkingtheplank.org/archive/viewuser.php?uid=513

I loved this story!  It was so hilarious, I found myself almost crying I was laughing so hard at times.  Especially at the scene were Snape, Harry, and Ron get back after testing Vox, that scene was priceless.  The story was well written, and the format that it was written in was very creative.  I loved that the story would have Hermione's writing about the events that led up to and the usage of Uns interwoven with the actual events that happened.  The characters were also perfect, Snape's and Harry's interaction with each other and then with all the other characters in the story made it vastly entertaining.  This story was ingenious and I look forward to reading it again at a later time.
I've decided to start posting on IJ also, I've went ahead and friended all my friends that have IJ over there, so hopefully y'all will friend me back!!!

Detention Served by Ananuensis, Snape sees a challenge before him--one he'll enjoy, Warning:  non-con, chan

This story can be found at:
http://www.amanuensis1.com/detentionserved.html

This story is well written dirty smut.  It is non-con and chan, so definitely not for everybody, but for the people who don't mind that kind of stuff - the story is very satisfying!

Harry Potter and the Single Father by lightgoddess,  For ladyredx1982 (a.k.a Mistress Vamp) at LJ, a Christmas Gift. Wish #3:Harry Potter fandom: Severus/Harry fanfic ~ Severus is a widowed daddy and Harry becomes his confidant, then later they become more than friends. Any length and any rating. Warning for cute kids, excessive fluff interspersed with angst, and lots of warm snugglies.   Warnings:  Major Fluff, OCC-ness, Spoilers

This story can be found at:
http://www.thesilversnitch.net/tss2/viewstory.php?sid=3998

I think that the warnings for this story can pretty much describe how this story is!  It is a cute story, I wouldn't say that I loved it, or would go out of my way to read it again, but it is definitely worth a read.  The story was pretty corny at times, but also touching.  Snape is very OCC, but he lost the man that he loved, so it is justified OCC.  It is different from all the other stories you read were Harry is the one who looses somebody and Snape steps in to comfort him.  I enjoyed the outcome, it was very refreshing twist.

Ready Made Family by The Minx 17, Harry Potter returns to the wizarding world with a young child in tow and ends up breaking past the walls set by a the resident Potions master.  Warning:  None.

The story can be found at:
http://hpfandom.net/eff/viewstory.php?sid=7078

I just finished reading Ready Made Family by The Minx 17, to tell the truth I wasn't all that fawned of it.  I found it to be kind of boring and a little to rushed at times.  I also found some scenes to be a little too cheesy at times.  Though I will admit that I absolutely loved Chrys, Harry's son.  He was just so adorable and I loved his interaction with Snape.  It was so cute when he would call Snape, "his sev"!  I also thought it was funny when Snape rushed Chrys to the bathroom so that he could use the big boy potty, and the whole pub heard Snape praising Chrys for using it!  I thought that one of the best parts of the story was the ending, it was very touching.

Give and Take by Merri-Todd Webster

The story can be found here:
http://inkstain.inkquill.com/isf/archive/8/giveand.html

The story is pretty much a vampiresnape story, Harry find Snape chained up in his rooms trying to kill himself b/c he lost his blood giver and Harry offers himself up.  

I like the idea of the story, but hated how the story was formatted.  The author would switch from Harry trying to convince Snape to take on him as his blood donor to future events and back again.  It got confusing at times and the first time it happens you don't know what the hell is going on until the next time it occurs.  The time line gets kind of blurry and you don't know if one section is a continuation of another section.  I think it would have been better if the author would have just separated the events and made the it a multiple chaptered story, I would have had a much enjoyable time reading it that way.  Other people might have an easy time reading and understanding the story and time line, but I know that I just got confused trying to figure everything out!

Shimmer by
eriador117
 , What happens when Snape discovers Harry's secret? A courting fic, crossdressing, little bit of angst and fluff :-), Warning:  Adult Language, Sexual Situations, OOC-ness

This story can be found here:
http://www.hpfandom.net/eff/viewstory.php?sid=5018

I had actually read this story a couple of months ago and then later today started to read it again thinking it was a different story!  It was just as enjoyable the second time around as the first.  This story is a nice little romance that does include crossdressing, very sexy!  I loved the idea of the white gloves being a sign of the intentions of courting, kind of like hitting somebody on the face with a glove being a sign of the intentions of dueling, lol!  I also loved the idea that a wizard/witch needs to be a virgin before marriage or they will be disinherited, it is an idea that I have not seen in a snarry fic before.  It would make since that Snape would not be a virgin and go through something like that.  And as always
eriador117
 did a great job at giving the reader enough information about what is happening without choking you on details, always a good thing.

I'm finding that
eriador117
 is an author of many skills.  I read another story by
eriador117
 a few weeks ago that I enjoyed, and was surprised to find that the Snape and Harry in that story were different than the Snape and Harry in this story.   A very good surprise, since Harry and Snape in both stories lived through different circumstances!  A lot of times authors will write 2 totally different stories with the characters growing up the living through totally different circumstances, yet the characters personalities and character traites are pretty much the same.  I think that it shows how skilled
eriador117
 is to be able to change the characters to reflect thier past and tone of the story and yet stay pretty much true to the canon.  It is very refreshing!

The Youngest Resident of Hogwarts by
alliekatgal
 , Harry discovers that his muggle girlfriend wants to put their baby up for adoption. Harry brings the child back to Hogwarts, and finds Snape to be unexpectedly helpful. Warning: Adult Language, Sexual Situations, OOC-ness

This story can be found at:
http://hpfandom.net/eff/viewstory.php?sid=5067

This fic was a breath of fresh air for me. It was sweet, cute, and angst free. I found the story to be an easy read and quiet enjoyable. I loved the atmosphere of the story, 
alliekatgal
knew when to expand on a scene and when to to minimize a scene. The story was set up nicely, the OOC-ness of the characters were refreshing, and the baby was just too cute. It was romantic fluff, but it was a nice change from all the dramatic stories that I've been reading lately.

The story focused completely of Harry's, Snape's, and the baby's relationship. Snape's and Harry's relationship started off with Snape helping with the baby and just to evolve naturally from there without confusion or dramatic insanity that you usually read in other stories. The author also managed to tie of all loose end nicely, living you with a feeling of closer. I would recommend this fic to anybody; I know that will be saving it to read again at a later date when I need some lighthearted fluff in my life.

Till Break of Day by Minx, Harry and Snape *slowly* figure out how to have a relationship after Harry leaves Hogwarts. Warning: Chan 16-18 

One Warm Beautiful Thing by Minx, Sequel to "Till Break of Day" and starts three weeks after the end of that story. If you haven't read that, this one won't make much sense. Problems from without and within threaten Harry and Snape's new relationship. Also takes place in the same universe as "Lost Feeling" and "Dead Till I Be With Him".  Warning:  Chan 16-18

Possessions by Minx, Sequel to "One Warm Beautiful Thing". A three-part story exploring some of the repercussions from the previous story.  Warning:  None

For Services Rendered by Minx, Response to Dixiebell's challenge: "Harry has something that Snape desperately wants.  Harry offers to trade him for it."  Then things get much more complicated than Snape anticipated.  Warning:  None

These Fics plus some more of Minx's Snarry can be found here:
http://www.walkingtheplank.org/archive/viewuser.php?uid=34


I didn't find Till Break of Day all that great, it was a good story, but I found it kind of boring.  The sex at the end is hot, Minx knows how to write a good sex scene, but the story itself didn't really tickle my fancy.  But to tell the truth I did like how she wrote it.  The plot was good and I don't think she could have really written it any different way without totally killing the story.  

I loved that in the beginning she didn't rush the relationship.  When Harry went to Snape in his office and Harry pretty much through himself at Snape; I loved that Snape denied him and made him wait until Harry got some out of school experience in love.  I think a lot of authors would go ahead with the sex from there, but it would have come off way to rushed.

I really like the sequel One Warm Beautiful Thing, I found it much more exciting than Till Break of Day.  I think it has to do with the fact that Harry and Snape were already in a relationship.  Unlike Till Break of Day, were Snape and Harry where dancing around each other, One Warm Beautiful Thing delved right into the two having to deal with past relationships and heartbreaks, and each others needs while dealing with EVERYBODY'S opion on THEIR relationship.  You also have murder attempts, kidnapping, and hot sex throw into the mix making it an on-the-edge-of-you-seat story.

Possessions was just as enjoyable and exciting as One Warm Beautiful Thing.  It kind of ties any of the loose ends in One Warm Beautiful Thing.  It deals with criminal trials, Harry's 19th birthday, and issues that Harry and Snape were still dealing with in reference to their relationship.  I loved the description of the gift that Snape gave Harry and how it was used in the story, made me want one!  I did feel that even though it tied off the loose ends in its prequel, that there were still some more loose ends that Possessions created.  I would have liked to see an epilogue that ties everything up, it would of even been great if the epilogue happened like 10 years in the future just to see how everything is going.

In the three stories I did find Snape to be OOC, but it worked.  I think that depending on his life experienced he would come out slightly different than in the canon.  It is okay to put your own spin on each of the characters as long as you keep what fundamentally makes them, well them.  Loved Lupin, but how could you not love the sweet Lupin.  I don't think I have found a story were Lupin is not made out to be a sweet, understanding, and the peacemaker.  I think I would be kind of traumatized if I ever read a story were Lupin was cruel or evil, ***shudders***.

For Service Rendered had nothing to do with the other fics, but like Till Day Break, I thought it was good, but it didn't really tickle my pickle.  I liked the concept of the storyline and I loved how Slytherin Harry was, very sly in how he delt with the situation.

I saw this quiz on
knightmare_shad
and thought it looked cute!

Result #3Albus Dumbledore tries to like you but doesnt trust something about you.Lord Voldemort wishes you were on his side.Minerva McGonagall thinks you are very talented.Severus Snape is secretly in love with you.Rubeus Hagrid tries to like you but doesnt really understand you.Horace Slughorn thinks you are all right.Sirius Black hates you and doesnt understand why Remus likes you.Remus Lupin worships the ground you walk on and would do anything to get you to love him back.Bill Weasley thinks of you as a best friend.Lucius Malfoy doesnt understand why Voldemort likes you.Bellatrix Lestrange wants to have you killed.Peter Pettigrew avoids you at all costs.

So I retook the liquid generation Harry Potter quiz again, it was so fun that I decided that I just had to take it a second time! I put down some answers that were me and some that were not so that I would get a different answer!


Find out your Harry Potter personality at LiquidGeneration!

About a week ago I read FOR SERVICES RENDERED by Quill Lumos, I didn't really like it.  I wasn't sure if I was going to put a review on my LJ for this story, but I figure if I'm going to write ones for stories I like then it is only fair that I write ones for stories I don't like.  I'm not much for flamers, but I will not lie about why I don't like the story either!

FOR SERVICES RENDERED summary is:  Harry Potter has been missing since childhood, Voldemort is on the rise again, a young Tom Riddle was resurrected when the Chamber of Secrets was opened and a child died, the prophecy says that only The Chosen One can defeat him,Complete Anal,Angst,Bon

I did think the story was well written, you can tell that the author took her time in developing the story and the grammar was good.  But as a whole I just wasn't all that into the story.  To be fair I'm not one for Harry slave/prostitute stories, but this isn't what ruined the story for me.  Harry and Snape were just way too OOC, actually most of the characters were too OOC.  I feel that if a story is AU and all the characters are OOC, then what is the point of having written the story as part of the fandom?  Shouldn't it be an original story?  If you are taking out the things that make Harry Potter, Harry Potter, than is it really fanfiction?

Also the relationship process was very unrealistic, snape rapes harry, becomes his new master, and b/c he doesn't treat Harry like total crap Harry falls in love with him!  I would think since Harry has been raped and trained to be a sex slave since he was little, that Harry would not be capable of the trust and love that he showed Snape without years of therapy.  Plus Harry was way too friendly and bubbly in the story.  He befriended everybody and always seemed to be way to trusting and happy, especially with all the things that he went through in the story.  He also told the story of what happened to him like it was no big deal to Snape, Dumbledore, Black, Lupin, the kids at school, and the media!  I would think that if somebody had all the crap happen to them that happened to harry, they would not be throwing the story around like it was no big deal.  Your reading the story and thinking "Yeah right!", throughout the whole thing!

I think that if you like slaveHarry stories and don't mind OOC, then the story is scan worthy.  Just because it isn't my cup of tea doesn't mean that other people will love it.

http://hp.adultfanfiction.net/story.php?no=600007474

I just got done reading A Nick in Time & Growing Pains by Tira Nog(
tiranog
), I must say I have fallen in love with this story!  They were simply beautiful.  The was the author developed the story and characters really grabbed you.  I love how she portrayed Snape, it was very unique.  This is the first time reading a story were their is a vulnerable Snape and yet the author still made him canon.  I also loved how Hermione and Ron were so much a part of Snape's life and emotional develop along side Harry.  A lot of stories they are only hang around Snape b/c he is with Harry.  But in these stories they are a very important part of his life before he gets with Harry, and they help him come to terms with his feelings for Harry.

Though I must admit that at times the storyline was kind of slow and the love scenes were not the best that I've read,(this is a bottom Snape) but I still think that this was one of the best Snarry love stories that I've read so fare.

A Nick in Time:  Harry Potter and Severus Snape awake to an unusual development on Boxing Day.
http://www.walkingtheplank.org/archive/viewstory.php?sid=799

Growing Pains:  Story is a sequel to A Nick In Time. Harry Potter and Severus Snape attempt to adjust to the changes in their lives and see if there is any place for the friendship they found as children.
http://www.walkingtheplank.org/archive/viewstory.php?sid=801

I've decided that instead of having all these Snarry bookmarks I would just list them all here!  That way I can have a summary and small review with them.  Much easier than looking through all my bookmarks for one fic!!!

The Care of Infants by stellahobbit, summary: A curse from Voldemort regresses Harry to infancy. Snape must protect him while the Order tries to find a way to reverse the spell. 

All of stellahobbit's snarry can be found at: http://www.walkingtheplank.org/archive/viewuser.php?uid=33

I enjoyed this fic, pretty light hearted stuff and quite cute reading how Snape would deal with a baby/child/teen Harry.  It was interesting way to have a relationship develop between Harry and Snape.  If you are looking for something different and fluffy with just the right amount of angst, than look no further can The Care of Infants.

I just finished a great Snarry fic called The Way Home by Eriador117, I must say it was so much better than I thought. A lot of times when I read a story were the main character has been sexually abused the author tends to make the recovery process and time very unrealistic. Eriador117 managed to make a story with a very realistic recovery process.

The story follows the premise that Harry was sold into a pedo brothel when he was 4 and when it was time for him to go to Hogwarts, Snape was the one to go and get him. The story is pretty much about Harry coping with the sexual abuse, school life, and then later on his feelings for Snape.

I think Eriador117 did a beautiful job in conveying to the reader the trauma that Harry is going through. She(I'm assuming the author is a girl) also did a great job in building a relationship between Snape and Harry. The relationship started off as guardian and ward, to best friends and then at Harry's last year, future lovers. I loved that she perfectly timed her time skips so that you didn't feel if you are missing anything important, and you were not bogged down with too much filler. I also loved that she didn't go into detail about the rapes, you know they happened, but no nasty details. She also didn't bog the story down with too much smut. I love smut as much as the next person, but sometimes it can overshadow and cheapen the story. I think that if you had put any more of it in the story then she did than the story would not have come out as good as it did.

If you are looking for an angsty story or a fluffy story than this is not it, if you are looking for a good drama and love story than you should defiantly check out The Way Home. The story was well written, the characters were well thought out and planned (I think considering the different circumstances they each went thought, Snape and Harry where not too OOC.), and the story was original.

http://hpfandom.net/eff/viewstory.php?sid=19864

I have found Snarry fic find and I have fallen in love!  Even though I don't really need any fics found for me, just reading the post and comments you can find loads of Snarry treasures!  

Lacy Things by Diana Williams is quite entertaining.  I never thought I would like Lupin/Snape, but how can you not love a cross dressing Snape and Alpha Lupin? http://diana.slashcity.com/series.php?seriesid=1

I've got so many Snarry fics to read now, I just don't know when I'm going to find time to sleep!

I have noticed that on sites such as adultfanfiction.net and fanfiction.net that the Snarry fics are pretty bad.  You can find some really good ones, but those are far and few between.  In most fandoms that I read each site has their good and bad ones, but I don't know what it is about snarry fics that bring out all the crappy writers, but it is pretty ridicules!  

I know that they are trying and everything, but really, check the grammar.  I know I'm not one to talk, since my grammar sucks, but if you write something, put it aside and go back and read it 2 hours later.  You catch the majority of you spelling and grammar errors that way.  You don't need a beta to find the grammar errors that distract the readers and kill the fic for them.

Also, some new ideas please!  I'm so tired of the fics were Harry is secretly in love with Snape and Snape knows and takes advantage of him in detention.  Even though Harry is a virgin, his first time is incredible, despite Snape being very rough with him.  Or Snape rescues Harry, and Harry falls in love with him b/c of it.  Completely ignoring all the other times Snape has rescued Harry, and Harry still hates him after that.  The list can go on and on.  It is fine if you want to use the same story line, but put some meat behind it.  Tell us how and why Harry falls in love with Snape, despite the burning mutual hate they had for each other.  Build up their relationship, so that it actually looks plausible.  Give the reader a story that they read and fill that they are their sharing Harry and Snape's first kiss, or first nonviolent conversation.  

Don't over angst or fluff the story.  The readers need angst, fluff, and a some comedy interspersed throughout the fic so that they don't OD on each one.  Too much of each can kill a fic faster that a Mary Sue can.  And please be sparse with the OCs and OOCness.  Snape is an ill tempered emo prick, but that is why we love him; so don't turn him into a kind hearted fairy.  You can have him care for Harry, have his nice moments, and yet still be the sarcastic sadistic person who find a little too much pleasure in torturing his students.  Before writing a story examine why you like the character and keep true to that characters personality.  If you don't like something about that character, than don't just write that characteristic out.  Make a plausible way for that characteristic to be changed; and no Snape being a spy and only "acting" that way is not a plausible way.

I'm sorry for my rant, but I just tired of wasting my time looking through so many fics and only finding badly written stuff.  Or reading a really good description for a fic, to only be disappointed when I start to read it.  I know that I'm not a writer and writing a story is much harder than it looks, but really it is like some of the writers out there are not even trying, or need to release that writing is not their calling in life and they really need to give up.  

I'm sorry to sound like such a bitch, but I just needed to get it off my chest.  I'm usually not like this, but I just wasted 4 hours going through Harry Potter fanfiction and finding nothing good!  A couple years ago I used to read things and think that everything with my favorite pairing was golden, but I have found that my taste have matured.  Now it is so hard to find good stuff out there.  LJ does have the best writers, and the Snarry and harry potter communities that I have joined have great stuff, but after a while you get kind of tired of oneshots, no matter how well written they are.  I've always favored multi chapter stories and for some reason those are pretty hard to find on LJ.

Snarry snobbery might also have to due with the fact the writers such as Lee Lee Potter, RiffRaff, and LilRinnieB have spoiled me!  They are some of the writers that I first started Harry Potter fiction on and they are so good that most other writers seem to fall short.  If you haven't read anything by them, then you have no idea what you are missing!  Lee Lee Potter has an epic fic going called Death Eater Takes a Holiday, it is by far the best snarry fic I have ever read and one of the best fics that I have read in all the fandoms.  DETAH is my drug and I'm a happy addict, though there hasn't been an update since 6/28 and there is usually one every month.  I'm so chopping at the bits!

P.s.  So sorry for the spelling errors, it isn't my forte and I've pretty much given up!
